attributes.action: Convene the Honours Forfeiture Committee to investigate Christopher Chope MP
attributes.background: Christopher Chope has consistently abused Parliamentary procedures to stifle debate and remove the voices of other Parliamentarians. He has been granted a knighthood and an OBE. The Honours Forfeiture Committee should investigate if he has brought the system into disrepute through his behaviour.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about honours. 

If you'd like the procedure of objecting to Bills to change, you may wish to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/222338

If you'd like the law on upskirting to change, you may wish to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/216290
